s: I went to visit some of buildings in this tour. Some things are very impractically designed. In one building there's a swing but it's too close to the wall and so I couldn't swing on it. Some tables are too high to use your laptop on comfortably. I appreciate that there's free tea and coffee. The tea could be better. It appears that whoever orders the coffee and tea is not a tea drinker. The coffee is Starbucks and the Starbucks tea is Teavana but the tea at Amazon is another brand ...
